column1: '''Vardarianna''' was an evergreen [[Fragrant Trees|fragrant tree]] which the [[Eldar]] brought to [[Númenor]] from [[Tol Eressëa|Eressëa]]
column2: as they brought many other trees
column4: [[nessamelda]] and [[oiolairë]]. All together these trees were called the [[Fragrant Trees]].<ref>{{UT|Numenor}}</ref>
